lexUnit.definition: COD: pick out as being the best of two or more alternatives.

sentence.text: Coincidentally , or maybe not , the storm chose that moment to let off a sheet of dazzling green lightning and an earsplitting crack of thunder .

Utah 's Dugway Proving Ground has been chosen as a site to test military vaccines against germ warfare agents .
QN : Who chose the Dugway Proving Ground as a site to test vaccines ?
Many Greek islanders chose to leave rather than live in poverty and terror , and many made new homes in the United States and Australia .
1- Choosing mountainous locations , preferably 1-3 hours from main cities , which have water resources .
3- If a mountainous location is unviable , then choose a location next to official buidings so as to avoid being bombarded .
4- Again , if the above is not possible , then choose a location next to residential areas , for the same reason as above .
Whether you choose to dine in one of the Macanese , Chinese , traditional Portuguese , or international - style restaurants , you will be treated to a hearty meal at a good price .
